definition.zh_def: 尤斯拉（Yusra）是一個阿拉伯女性名字，意指「幸福」或「繁榮」。
definition.en_def: Yusra is an Arabic female name meaning 'ease' or 'prosperity.'
definition.example: Yusra is excited to start her new job next week.
